# Victoria Coren Mitchell

-   Expert poker player
-   Sense of humour
-   Presents my favourite TV show
-   Lovely sense of style
-   Excellent writer

[Victoria Coren Mitchell](http://www.victoriacoren.com/)

![](../images/vcmpoker.jpg)

Victoria Coren Mitchell is a British TV personality who presents "Only Connect", a gameshow which harbours nerds from disciplines such as Chemical Engineering [@sen2018slide]. Prior to this, she was primarily known as a poker player whose memoir offers an interesting glimpse into the experiences of women in the area [@rak2022pocket].
